title: New rules to help lower- and moderate-income applicants qualify for mortgages
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Business - Today 
New rules adopted last month by Fannie Mae will allow mortgage applicants to qualify for a home loan by counting the salaries of other relat...
